level.text: The Department may engage in special pilot procurements in accordance with Section 408 of the PPRA and this chapter.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DC 8805 (October 14, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 985, 1010 (February 10, 2012).
